#!/usr/bin/env ruby
matchers = {} matchers[')'] = '(' matchers[']'] = '[' matchers['}'] = '{'
# short for escape_snippet - escapes special snippet characters in str def es(str) str.to_s.gsub(/([$`\\])/, "\\\\\\1") end
line = $stdin.read() index = ENV['TM_LINE_INDEX'].to_i() closer = line[index - 1].chr() opener = matchers[closer]
# do nothing if we aren't on a closer if opener == nil print es(line[0..index-1]) + '$0' + es(line[index..-1]) exit end
length = line[0..index - 2].length - 1 depth = 1 length.downto(0) do |i| ch = line[i].chr() if ch == closer depth += 1 elsif ch == opener depth -= 1 end
if depth == 0 print es(line[0..i-1]) + '$0' + es(line[i..-1]) exit end end
# if we bail out to here we never found the open print es(line[0..index-1]) + '$0' + es(line[index..-1])
